title: The Amazing Southeast Asia!
text:

Southeast Asia is a subregion of Asia with a collection of states located between the Indian Ocean and the Pacific Ocean. It is a favorite destination for the budget travelers and provides a wide range of sights to explore and spend a long vacation. Here are the top destinations of Southeast Asia that are a must visit to delve into the charm of this amazing world. Bangkok: The capital city of Thailand is a sprawling metropolis which is known for its sparkling holy places and vibrant street life. It is a diverse city with a huge number of interesting spots and visual delights that will make your trip exciting and memorable. Do not forget to visit the top attractions of this wonderful place, such as Lumphini Park, Grand Palace, Dusit Zoo, Safari World, Wat Saket, etc. You can browse cheap flight tickets on the web and fly at highly affordable prices. Cambodia: This is yet another gem of the Southeast Asia, which is famous for its beautiful landscapes, historical monuments and archeological sites that will leave you awestruck. While you are taking a trip to this nation, there are a large number of attractions that shall not be missed at all, such as the Bayon, Wat Phnom, Angkor Wat, Preah Vihear Temple, Kep National Park, Tonle Bati, Preah Khan, etc. The charm of this destination is so high that you just canâ€™t get over it. Indonesia: The land of volcanic islands, Indonesia is an amazing destination to be at. Known for its beaches, volcanoes and jungles, the country makes a popular tourist destination for visitors from all over the world. A trip to Southeast Asia is incomplete without taking a ride into this popular attraction, such as Borobudur, Seminyak, Ubud Monkey Forest, Prambanan, Mount Bromo, Sanur, Puru Luhur Uluwatu, etc. There is a lot more to explore, so book a flight to Indonesia today and enjoy your stay. Malaysia: The heart of the Southeast region, Malaysia is a renowned tourist destination in the world. The skyscraper buildings, exuberant shopping malls and the mixed cultures make it a versatile yet amazing destination to spend a holiday with friends or family. Petronas Towers, Batu Caves, Mount Kinabalu, Taman Negara, Sunway Lagoon, Gunung Mulu National Park, Bukit Bintang, etc. are the major attractions of the country that make it a shining star of the region. So, if you are planning a trip to the Southeast Asia, Malaysia should definitely on the list. 
There are a lot more destinations of the region that will make your holiday a memorable one, so pack your bags and take a trip to the Southeast Asia to experience an altogether different world. Source: Free Articles from ArticlesFactory.com ABOUT THE AUTHOR
